column4: I sat down with Ted Koppel on @CBSSunday to discuss our fight for justice in America, our race against time, the future of our children in this country, and much more. Watch now! https://t.co/5g4XeJBsXA https://t.co/jkjuZWKLYE
@AttorneyCrump @CBSSunday Excellent interview!  \nThank you for all you are doing.
